name: Granzermagik
description:
There comes a time, when science is so advanced, it becomes no different from magic. You are sent to destroy the Lord of Magik across town, and then realized...you were played, boi.

--------------------

Made for the Dreamhack Summer Jam of 2019, this one is a modified and more stable version made some time after.

--------------------

Please, if you find a problem, something not working, etc, let me know in the comments.

--------------------

Read this part only if you really don't know what to do and getting annoyed by it:

You have to pick fruits from the trees, this gives you a resource that lets you build forts by pressing the shift key. Each fort will automatically produce your ammo, which you shoot by pressing the space bar. Shoot at the enemy forts until they are destroyed (set on fire) Once you destroy all the enemy forts a door opens at the right end which leads to the endgame.
